Author: Clover
Name: Immersive Flavor Text
Punchline: It provides more immersive flavor text.
Description:
My garbage quality plugin to help me learn how to work with Dalamud.
Somewhat of a RP toolkit, so far it only provides immersive flavor text.

[Feature] Temperature suggestions
Reworked config window a bit, also added /immersiveconfig command for easy access
